commentBody:
Thanks goodness the 49ers let J Tomsula go.

He is a decent man who was in the wrong place.

The unfortunate tenure of Mr Tomsula as an NFL head coach is just part of the damage caused by 49er owner Jed York.

Fans of this historic franchise hope that Mr York either repeats his uncle's success in finding the right football minds to operate the team, or sells the team to people who will.
